Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I am running Heritrix such that it crawls URLs from within a given domain
(the domain corresponding to the seed URLs).

I seed the crawler with some URLs  of the target domain by querying a search
engine API.

When running this crawler instance, I have noticed that the crawler
"freezes" after some number of URLs (around 33K). While the Java process
still keeps running, no additional URLs get crawled once the crawler enters
this state.

Note that the domain has a much larger number of URLs (evident by doing a
search engine search) than 33K. I want to crawl a much larger number of URLs
- upto 100s of thousands.

Any immediate reasons why the crawler would stop making progress after this
number of URLs.

Does it have to do with the fact that the crawler is running in a
domain-specific mode ?

Thanks.

--00163698966f440206047060d748
